channel.title: NPC's not dropping items?
channel.description:
My NPC's are not dropping Items. Here is my code:
[code] npcdrop = 897 3 76 1 85 1 275 1 293 1 298 1 423 1 432 1 601 1 605 1 709 1 758 1 760 1 788 1 983 1[/code](This is the only monster that I really WANT to drop anything) So... Anyone know whats wrong? I mean, maybe it is the drop type? ( 3 ) ... Or like... did I arrange it wrong. BTW... my NPC's die weird, they die, they stay there in like a glitched position for 5 seconds, then they disappear.

item.title: NPC's not dropping items?
item.dc:creator: @samuraiblood2 samuraiblood2
item.description:
@samuraiblood2 wrote:

Is not thread, its easy to fix realy, all the code is just commented.

Read full topic

item.title: NPC's not dropping items?
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“samuraiblood2, post:2, topic:80350”]You need to fix the void in npchandler.java, right now your npcdrop.cfg/drop.cfg is completly useless.[/quote]Could you give me a link to a thread with that info please? Or tell me to where it might be?

Read full topic

@samuraiblood2 wrote:

You need to fix the void in npchandler.java, right now your npcdrop.cfg/drop.cfg is completly useless.
